doc.goal: how to make fava bean-mint toast
doc.sol1: Cook 1 bushel shelled fava beans in salted boiling water, 2 minutes; drain and cool in ice water, then peel. Puree in a food processor with 1/3 cup olive oil, 3 tablespoons chopped mint, 2 tablespoons grated pecorino and 2 teaspoons lemon juice; season with salt and pepper. Spread on 4 slices toasted olive bread; top with more pecorino and mint.
doc.sol2: Cook 1 cup shelled fava beans in salted boiling water, 2 minutes; drain and cool in ice water, then peel. Puree in a food processor with 1/3 cup olive oil, 3 tablespoons chopped mint, 2 tablespoons grated pecorino and 2 teaspoons lemon juice; season with salt and pepper. Spread on 4 slices toasted olive bread; top with more pecorino and mint.

Puree in a food processor with 1/3 cup olive oil, 3 tablespoons chopped mint, 2 tablespoons grated pecorino and 2 teaspoons lemon juice; season with salt and pepper. Spread on 4 slices toasted olive bread; top with more pecorino and mint.

doc.goal: How do you remove gum from being stuck in hair?
doc.sol1: Apply an ice cube and gently remove the hardened gum.
doc.sol2: Use a blow dryer and gently remove melted gum.
doc.query:
Goal: How do you remove gum from being stuck in hair?
Answer:
choices: Apply an ice cube and gently remove the hardened gum.
Use a blow dryer and gently remove melted gum.

doc.goal: change a lightbulb in a ceiling fan
doc.sol1: Turn the switch off for the fan and light.Carefully reach up and take hold of the bulb that is blown. If it is hot because it has been on recently, use a cloth to protect your hands. Unscrew the bulb and carefully screw in a new bulb until it breaks in your hand
doc.sol2: Turn the switch off for the fan and light.Carefully reach up and take hold of the bulb that is blown. If it is hot because it has been on recently, use a cloth to protect your hands. Unscrew the bulb and carefully screw in a new bulb until it is tight.
